meanings.definition: To transfer or dispense liquid using a pipette.
meanings.sent1: She carefully pipetted the solution into the test tube.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, I pipetted the colored liquids into separate vials.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy scientist pipetted the liquid all over the lab bench.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like carefully pipetted drops of wisdom into my mind.
meanings.sent5: The rain pipetted down from the sky, filling the streets with puddles.
